name: Pong-Anoid
description:
Welcome to Pong-Anoid a new spin on two classic games Pong and Arkanoid with 2 ways to win.

  1. Get 9 points by getting your ball past your opponents side of the screen
  2. Get all 20 brick on your side of the screen

The balls are unstable and will switch teams to the last paddle that hit them. The bricks are unstable and will move toward the team of the last ball that hit them. The power-ups are unstable and will do 1 of these random effects:

  • Slow down your or your opponent's balls
  • Speed up your or your opponent's balls
  • Shrink your or your opponent's paddle
  • Enlarge your or your opponent's paddle
  • Give you or your opponent a new ball

Controls

  • General
    • Title Screen
      • Space - Start the Game
      • Esc - Close the game
    • In-Game
      • P - Pause/Unpause
        • Esc - Go back to the title screen
      • Win Screen
        • R - Reset 
        • Esc - Go back to the title screen
  • Player 1 Green Paddle (Left Side)
    • W - Move Up
    • S - Move Down
    • D - Let go of ball(s)
  • Player 2 Red Paddle (Right Side)
    • Up Arrow - Move Up
    • Down Arrow - Move Down
    • Left Arrow - Let go of ball(s)
